v2.2.0.0 (February 05, 2016)

CHANGELOG

Bug fixes

  1. "Save As" abnormal program exit

New features

  1. The new logo (Designed by joekele7@gmail.com)
  2. Automatically adjust the size of the Application Window according to the size of the screen
  3. Add "Report Bug / Request a New Feature" menu
  4. Add "One Light" Theme

Enhancements

  1. more better theme - "One Dark"
  2. backup file using "json" suffix
